item.description:
Come fill your Belly with delicious Moroccan food, and enjoy the Belly dancing and some Belly laughs as we bring our own bottles for a fun night in the Kasbah Garden Cafe at 105 Howe St in New Haven,

Enjoy a special nights in the garden featuring musicians, fire dancing, and the Celadon Tribal Belly Dance!

Bring your favorite bottle of wine, and come enjoy wonderful food, atmosphere and dance

The Kasbah is a genuine Middle Eastern / Moroccan Restaurant. It has good food and is reasonably priced, but its main draw is its unique garden atmosphere.
Nestled in a little courtyard between houses and apartment buildings, this restaurant has outdoor seating in a beautiful and peaceful garden, shaded from the sun and insulated from the noise of the city.
The food is simple but good, middle eastern food with a Moroccan bent to it. They have good vegetarian options as well as good desserts teas, coffees and especially home made Baklava.

http://kasbahgarden.c...

The evening plans could change based upon the weather.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Belly, Belly, Belly and BYOB
